title.rendered: “IDF Plans to Demolish House of Ram Junction Shooter: A Response to Terrorism”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF has announced its intention to demolish the house of the terrorist who carried out the shooting attack at Ram Junction.

Yesterday (Wednesday), the IDF notified its intention to seal and demolish the house where the terrorist Fadi Jamjoum lived. The terrorist carried out a shooting attack at Ram Junction on February 16, 2024, in which an Israeli citizen and a reserve IDF soldier, Master Sergeant (Res.) Uri Yaish were murdered and others were injured.

In addition, following the temporary sealing of the terrorist’s house since February 18, 2024, the commander of the Home Front Command signed an order extending the sealing and temporary closure until the actual demolition of the house.
